get.description:
List all characters.

The returned payload will not include the character sheet details.
Returns all details of a given character.

put.description:
Update a character details.

Examples of JSON body paylods:

- `{"level": 5 }`
- `{"name": "Toto"}`
- `{"class_": "Guerrier", "data": {"background": "Folk Hero"}}`

In the last example, we update both a direct character attribute
as well as an attribute nested in the character JSON data.

delete.description: Delete the character associated with the slug and the currently logged in player id

post.description: Create a new character, without any data nor equipment

put.description: Ensure the argument item is present in the character's equipment

delete.description: Ensure the argument item is absent from the character's equipment

put.description: Set the argument equipped item as equipped
Set the argument equipped item as unequipped
Ensure the argument spell is added to the character's spellbook

delete.description: Ensure the argument known spell is absent from the character's spellbook

put.description: Set the argument known spell as prepared
Set the argument known spell as unprepared

get.description: List all parties the current player has characters in
Display details of a given party
Display all details of a given player.

put.description:
Update a player details.

Examples of JSON body paylods:

post.description:
Submit a player's username and password to login.

If the password verifies, returns a JWT usable to communicate with the API.
If not, raise a 401 error.

get.description: Return all details of a given spell.
Return all details of a given item.

data.description: The embdedded character sheet JSON data

verbal.title: Whether casting the spell requires a vocal component

somatic.title: Whether casting the spell requires a somatic component

material.title: The material components required to cast the spell

data.title: Updates to the character sheet fields (Optional)
